mapper.insert: insert into dish (id, name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{categoryId},#{price},#{image},#{description},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select d.*,df.id dfId,df.dish_id dishId,df.name dfName,df.value dfValue from dish d left join dish_flavor df on d.id = df.dish_id
and d.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update dish
name = #{name},
category_id = #{categoryId},
price = #{price},
image = #{image},
description = #{description},
status = #{status},
update_time = #{updateTime},
